name: getlearningresourcesbytopic
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool dei.
Tool description: The Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI) API offers the learning resources, conferences, stories and other information.
API description: Fetch Azure learning resources by topic and page number.

topic.description: The specific topic to search for learning resources.

page.description: The page number to retrieve learning resources from.
